name: Deep Explorer
description:
You are about to load a Program that travels through the real files in your computer. Help him to advance by modifying these files. Don't worry, he is harmless and appreciates your help :)

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D -> Movement.
  • Space -> Jump.
  • R -> Reload level.
  • Escape -> Exit game.

A game made by me for a class assignment about using persistent storage in games.
